submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        h_cut_piece = 1
        v_cut_piece = 1
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        i = 0
        j = 0
        ans = 0
        while i < m - 1 and j < n - 1:
            if horizontalCut[i] > verticalCut[j]:
                ans += horizontalCut[i] * v_cut_piece
                h_cut_piece += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += verticalCut[j] * h_cut_piece
                v_cut_piece += 1
                j += 1
        while i < m - 1:
            ans += horizontalCut[i] * v_cut_piece
            i += 1
        while j < n - 1:
            ans += verticalCut[j] * h_cut_piece
            j += 1
        return ans
